Body.Content:
Start using the newest Windows 11 capabilities with helpful tips and actionable steps summarized in one place.â€¯Discover the Windows 11 Roadmap, quick machine recovery, attestation readiness verifier for TPM reliability, various enhancements across Microsoft Intune and AI, and so much more. Dive deeper into Windows management, security, and productivity by watching the latest Technical Takeoff sessions on demand. 
 
When will this happen: 
Improvements summarized in this monthly recap are already available. Note that some of them are being rolled out gradually. 
 
How this will affect your organization: 
You can start seeing improvements across various workflows in your organization with: 
  • Windows 11 Roadmap 
  • Quick machine recovery 
  • Attestation readiness verifier for TPM reliability 
  • Microsoft Intune Vulnerability Remediation Agent and Advanced Analytics 
  • AI features new to Copilot+ PCs 
  • Additional improvements released in March 
 
What you need to do to prepare: 
Read the new monthly recap and additional information to start benefiting from the latest improvements.

Additional information: 
Read the monthly recap at Windows news you can use: March 2025. It includes highlights from the following channels: 
  • Windows IT Pro Blog 
  • Microsoft Intune Blog 
  • Windows Insider Blog 
  • Windows 11 update history 
  • Windows Server update history 
  • Microsoft 365 Copilot Blog

Title: Get started with March 2025 improvements in Windows 11
